Articles.Content:
ok what i am looking for is simple, it was a mod that acted as an expansion to B9 Aerospace

it was a mod that added IVAs to B9 but i can't remember which one was it exactly

i am aware of D12 Aerotech and the old S2 IVA mod but i think there was a third one that added more

i only need it so that i can repurpose an IVA from it for stuff

THe mod you were talking about was made by K3|Chris and that thread has gotten taken over by the most recent B9 iteration. You might talk to K3|Chris and see if he still has the files floating around.

hmm i will talk to him about that.... Thanks for the help
